unnormalised: Arrey yaar, I lost out on some serious cash when the USD to INR rate jumped from ₹82 to ₹83.5 in just 2 days! Should've converted my $500 last week itself.
normalised: Arrey yaar, I lost out on some serious cash when the U-S-D to I-N-R rate jumped from rupee eighty two to rupee eighty three point five in just two days! Should have converted my dollar five hundred last week itself.
